name: Wing Kwan LI
slogan: Life is a process of debugging, the more you hate the stronger you are
tips: Press ctrl + p to print this resume

content: 2 years solid side project experience on building distributed system.
Involved design and implementation of cloud infrastructure, backend and frontend from scratch.
Enjoy discovering the best solution to solve complex problems.

project.title: Android barcode scanner
project.description: Scan multiple barcodes from WebView, getting a barcode scanner to work in customer's android phone when triggered from a web application running inside a webview on the native app.

tips.title: My works
content: Develop a simple web form loaded in the webview that loaded on startup.
Making the native barcode scanner is invoked from Javascript on webview to scan the barcodes from camera or images, all being scanned together and displayed on the webpage.

project.title: Desktop Stock management Tool
project.description: Development of stock management tool dashboard

tips.title: My works
content: Prepare documentations which include UML diagrams.

project.title: Healthcare progressive web app
project.description: Development Healthcare dashboard that supports responsive solution on Tablet and Mobile screen size, both in Potrait and Landscape view

tips.title: My works
content: Develop header, footer and menu and notification component.
Design and Develop api signature algorithm.

tips.title: My works
content: Develop base components which include swiper, footer menu, lazy-loading listview.

project.description: All-in-one progressive web app for anime enthusiast to read light novel, manga and watch TV animation.

tips.title: Everything is built from scrach
content: Develop distributed web scraping service from various websites & apps.
Integrate multiple external non-consistent raw data into standard data structure.
Develop restful apis for frontend use.
Design and implement ebook conversion algorithms to convert horizonal text layout Chinese txt, mobi, azw3, epub to Traditional Chinese ebook with vertical text layout.
Build a load-test framework, scaled cloud service provider automatically and simulate concurrent connections.
Develop in-app send to kindle ebook reader service.
Design and Develop mobile progressive web app interface.

project.title: Restaurant Admin panel

Rewrite the CRUD form and exiting route controller.
